Figure 2 - 
              
          Globba magnibracteata Y.Y.Sam A Habit B Inflorescence C Sterile bract D Bracteole E Flower F Ovary and calyx G Dorsal corolla lobe in front and side view H Lateral corolla lobe in ventral and side view I Lateral staminodes in ventral and side view J Labellum K Anther appendages L Stigma. name: Figure 2 from: Sam YY, Ibrahim H (2016) A new Globba with large white floral bracts from Peninsular Malaysia. PhytoKeys 73: 117-124. https://doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.73.9737
